title: Ceremonial Hanging, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: painted on plain weave
inscribed: fragment of a paper label with Indonesian (?) writing on it.
description: Figures seated in a pavilion on either side of a tree with other figures - demons and dancers (?) above. Polychrome.

early 20th century. Medium: cotton
